list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who habitually gets out of bed at a particular time of the morning.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: late risers always exasperate early risers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Risers muộn luôn bực tức dậy sớm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a vertical section between the treads of a staircase.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: make risers low and treads deep
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: làm cho riser thấp và giẫm sâu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a vertical pipe for the upward flow of liquid or gas.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this pressure carries water through the risers to the upper floors
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Áp lực này mang nước qua những người dậy ở các tầng trên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a low platform on a stage or in an auditorium, used to give greater prominence to a speaker or performer.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he fell backwards off the riser
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ngã lùi ra khỏi riser

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a strip of webbing joining the harness and the rigging lines of a parachute or paraglider.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: constantly adjust the risers to keep the wing overhead
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: liên tục điều chỉnh các riser để giữ trên đầu cánh
